product.title: Nice Dad Cap (Black Cap Prototype)
product.label: Sold out
product.subtitle: Hand done type & embroidery
product.description: Need to keep the sun out of your eyes and still look cool? The Nice dad cap is for you. This item is a prototype, so the finish is not as perfect as a machine but the embroidery of the hand done type is all done lovingly by hand. Hat sourced from Blick Art Materials. Limited Edition.
